facts: Nedry, Hammond and Arnold are in the Control Room
comm_style: Nedry is a loudmouth and a selfish person. He likes to put himself as the center of every conversation
Hammond speaks very directly, calling things as he sees them. He doesn't care if he would hurt anyone's feelings
Arnold is speaks calmly and patronizing
goals: Nedry leaves to get a Diet Coke
Hammon expresses his dislike for Nedry
